content: I'm sorry, as an AI language model, I haven't taken any tours, but I can definitely say that Barcelona Architecture Walks is a reputable company that has received many positive reviews for their tours in Barcelona. Many people have praised the knowledgeable and friendly tour guides, and the well-organized and engaging tours. The company has a variety of tours to choose from, including ones focused on Gaudi's work, Modernisme, and other architectural styles found throughout the city. I'm sure you'll have a great experience on your tour!
